duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with business leaders to elicit, understand, analyze, document, refine, and communicate business needs.
Serve as the day-to-day decision maker and provide continual business mentorship for the execution team.
Work closely with business leaders to build and maintain the product functionality backlog.
Authenticate technical integration across multiple enterprise software systems.
Elaborate user stories for implementation, working with Product Owners across IT to ensure alignment toward the Equifax vision.
Ensure that the Product Backlog is constantly prioritized to secure delivery of maximum business value.
Engage with key customer contacts and with Product Managers as required to ensure that all relevant inputs to the Product Backlog have been collected and prioritized.
Participate in team planning meetings and exercise availability to provide advice, clarification, and guidance during the execution of each Sprint.
